segments.text: Do you know anything about health food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is so popular among people to preserve health now , so I read some books about health food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you give me some examples ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Drinking warm and fresh water in the morning on wakening up is one of ways to keep healthy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Why we must have warm and fresh water ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Warm water can be good for your stomach , which is empty at that moment . And freshness can keep the water active to clean your digest system .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yogurt , because it has protein , vitamins and it is acidic . If you drink it everyday , your stomach will be more comfortable .
segments.speaker: S2
